changeSet.author: Travis
changeSet.comment: Add 'yyyy-MM-dd' date format to STRING_TO_DATE_FORMATS parameter text

column.name: txt
column.value: yyyy-MM-dd;MM/dd/yy;MM/dd/yyyy;MM-dd-yy;MMddyy;MMMM dd;yyyy;MM/dd/yy HH:mm:ss;MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss;MM-dd-yy HH:mm:ss;MMddyy HH:mm:ss;MMMM dd HH:mm:ss;yyyy HH:mm:ss;MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm a
